name: Lord-O-Cat
description:
Your master, an orange cat, has grown tired of sleeping all day long and now wants to see the world. You, his faithful pet, will help him.

Made for the Godot WildJam #29 in one week.

Controls:

Arrows or WASD for movement.

E for interaction

ESC to close... or go back, Im not sure anymore.

Personal note:

You know when you lose or reset a level it is supposed to reset all variables, right? Well I didnt have time for that, so if you want to restart the game you gonna need to close it and start it again. Thank you for your understanding.

I wanted the ending to be more "cinematic", with dramatic music, sound effects and a ball of hair being coughed. Also better papers. Not enough time sadly. I'm quite happy with the result though, first time using audacity too and speaking in a different language.

In case you are having problems:

You can open the fridge.
The hammer was not there first.
You gotta break the glass door of the supermarket.
